recommendationview module¶

Module implementing the movie recommendation view.

class recommendationview.RecommendationView(parent, controller, movie_title)[source]¶

Bases: CTkFrame

Class representing the movie recommendations view. Inherits from customtkinter.CTkFrame.

Parameters:

  • parent (customtkinter.CTkBaseClass) – Parent widget.

  • controller (App) – Application controller.

  • movie_title (str) – Title of the movie for which recommendations are generated.

generate_recommendations()[source]¶

Generates and displays movie recommendations based on selected features. Clears previous recommendations and displays new results in results_frame. If no features are selected or no recommendations are found, displays an appropriate message.

go_back()[source]¶

Returns to the movies list view.

letterboxd_clone
